jchess.gamelogic

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.gamelogic.Clock

  • public class Clock
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent seperate wall-clock for one player. Full ChessClock is represented by GameClock object (two clock - one for each player)
